content: the cardigan is worked from the bottom up in a simple cable pattern first the body is worked back and forth up to the armholes then the sleeves are worked in the round the pieces are joined after the armhole bind-offs and the yoke is worked back and forth with raglan decreases the yoke is finished with a folded ribbed neckband finally stitches are picked up along the fronts and the button band and buttonhole band are worked in rib
